# Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Recurrence

**Enumeration**

Describes the cadence at which an alarm will repeat, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Recurrence
```

## Recurring alarms

- **Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Recurrence.never**: An alarm that never repeats.
- **Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Recurrence.weekly(_:)**: An alarm that repeats weekly, on the specified day.

## Describing an alarm

- **repeats**: The cadence at which the alarm repeats, if any.
- **time**: The hour and minute at which the alarm alerts, relative to the device’s current timezone.
